results.title: After a Neighbor’s Complaint, Gunman Kills Five People in Texas Home
results.abstract: The attack on Friday night started after a man was asked by neighbors to stop shooting in his yard, the authorities said. The gunman remained at large.

results.title: A Towering, Terrifying Demon Horse Isn’t Even the Weirdest Part
results.abstract: The Denver airport is a magnet for conspiracy theories — and a case study in the line between mass delusion and fun.

media.caption: “Mustang,” a 32-foot-tall sculpture by the artist Luis Jimenez that is also known as Blucifer, stands outside Denver International Airport. Some people wonder if it is actually the pale horse of the apocalypse (the one ridden by Death).

results.title: As Biden Runs Again, Black Voters’ Frustration Bubbles
results.abstract: In interviews, Black voters, organizers and elected officials pointed to what some saw as unkept promises — raising questions about the enthusiasm of Democrats’ most loyal voters.
